did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Harry F. Byrd Press Release, 18 December 1955

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Harry F. Byrd Press Release, 18 December 1955. Accession 40054. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Harry Flood Byrd (1887-1966) served as governor of Virginia from 1926-1930 and United States Senator from Virginia from 1933-1965.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Press release, 18 December 1955, by Senator Harry Flood Byrd, in favor of a referendum calling for a constitutional convention to revise and amend Section 141 of the Virginia constitution. Section 141 concerned the appropriation of funds for educational purposes. The act was approved on 19 January 1956.
